    Functions to retrieve values from requests.

    • Method Detail

      • getValueSingle

        public static String getValueSingle(Map<String,String[]> request,
                                    String name)
                             throws JFPExceptionNonexistent,
                                    JFPExceptionInvalidArgument
        Retrieve a value from an HTTP request.
        Parameters:
        request - The request parameters.
        name - The parameter name.
        Returns:
        The value.
        Throws:
        JFPExceptionNonexistent - If the value is missing.
        JFPExceptionInvalidArgument - If the parameter has multiple values.
